Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Value: Nanotechnology - Special Issue of ME Magazine 2004

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Value: This special issue on Nanotechnology has several visionary articles by leaders with a mechanical engineering perspective. Titles include "Engineering without limits" by Steven L. Girshick and Arun Majumdar, "Points of light: Nanodots glow in the dark or elimnate dark entirely" by Jeffrey Winters, and "special delivery Pharmaceutical companies aim to target their drugs with nano precision" by Cindy H. Dubin. Vol. 1/ No. 2, September 2004, ME Magazine, American Society of Mechanical Engineers (ASME).
